price: If We had willed, We could have sent to each town a warner[28].
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
footnotes: [28] But instead, Allah sent Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ) as the final messenger for all people.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
